description: Returns a summary of metrics for an account from a specified date, including number of open findings, the categories with most findings, the scans with most open findings, and scans with most open critical findings.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date you want to retrieve summary metrics from, rounded to the nearest day. The date must be within the past two years.

nested_items.name: metricsSummary
nested_items.description: The summary metrics from the specified date.

nested_items.name: categoriesWithMostFindings
nested_items.description: A list of CategoryWithFindingNum objects for the top 5 finding categories with the most findings.

nested_items.name: categoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the finding category. A finding category is determined by the detector that detected the finding.

nested_items.name: findingNumber
nested_items.description: The number of open findings in the category.

nested_items.name: date
nested_items.description: The date from which the metrics summary information was retrieved.

nested_items.name: openFindings
nested_items.description: The number of open findings of each severity.

nested_items.name: critical
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a critical finding.

nested_items.name: high
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a high severity finding.

nested_items.name: info
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to an informational finding.

nested_items.name: low
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a low severity finding.

nested_items.name: medium
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a medium severity finding.

nested_items.name: scansWithMostOpenCriticalFindings
nested_items.description: A list of ScanNameWithFindingNum objects for the top 3 scans with the most number of open critical findings.

nested_items.name: findingNumber
nested_items.description: The number of findings generated by a scan.

nested_items.name: scansWithMostOpenFindings
nested_items.description: A list of ScanNameWithFindingNum objects for the top 3 scans with the most number of open findings.

nested_items.name: findingNumber
nested_items.description: The number of findings generated by a scan.
